text: Spider-Man is a 2002 action-adventure video game based on the 2002 movie Spider-Man. Tobey Maguire and Willem Dafoe return to voice in the game, with Bruce Campbell as the narrator. ==Gameplay== Spider man can battle enemies on rooftops and enclosed areas. Once the game is first completed, it can unlock a second walkthrough as Harry Osborn with the Green Goblin armor. ==Plot== Peter Parker decided to follow Spike, a gang member who killed Uncle Ben. After stopping Spike, Peter Parker became known as Spider-Man. ==Reception== The game has had mixed to positive reviews. Some didn't like how it felt like a rehash of the 2000 game aside from celebrity voices returning and the movie's plot. title: Spider-Man (2002 video game)
